account_number.description: The PPS/Account Number from the statement (9-digit number)

issue_date.description: The issue date of the statement in YYYY-MM-DD format

previous_charges.description: Previous charges amount (positive number with 2 decimal places)

previous_payment.description: Previous payment amount (positive number with 2 decimal places, even though shown as negative on statement)

previous_charges_outstanding.description: Previous charges outstanding amount (number with 2 decimal places, can be zero)

current_charges.description: Total current charges amount (positive number with 2 decimal places)

payment_due_date.description: Payment due date in YYYY-MM-DD format

statement_details.description: Array of phone number billing details

items.description: Billing details for a single phone number

subtotal.description: Subtotal amount for this phone number (positive number with 2 decimal places)

charge_description.description: Array of individual charges for this phone number

name.description: Description of the charge in English (e.g., 'HKBN mobile services(15GB, Unlimited mins)', 'HKBN mobile services Disc', 'Administration Fee', 'Administration Fee Disc')

period.description: Service period in format YYYY/MM/DD - YYYY/MM/DD

charge.description: Charge amount (positive for charges, negative for discounts, with 2 decimal places)
